articles.title: 7 Simple Hacks To Deal With Food Allergies: Experts Share Tips And Tricks
articles.description: Food allergies across all age groups are a common occurrence in today's day and age, according to research such allergies severely affect 6% of adults and 8% of children across the globe on a day-to-day basis.

articles.title: Ghana Reports First Cases of Deadly Marburg Virus; 98 Under Quarantine
articles.description: The Marburg virus can spread from infected animals, including bats
articles.content:
Two cases of the deadly Marburg virus have been identified in Ghana, the first time the Ebola-like disease has been found in the West African nation, health authorities announced Sunday.
